targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM by_country_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "country_isocode"
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE install_version !~ /v2(.*)/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),status
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE install_version =~ /v2(.*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),status
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM by_country_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "country"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE "install_version"  =~ /^$version/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),install_version
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' AND "install_version"  =~ /^$version/ GROUP BY time($interval),install_version
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE   install_version !~ /v2(.*)/
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND   install_version !~ /v2(.*)/  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("running") FROM containers_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") FROM containers_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("host") FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("windows") FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cpu") FROM hosts_1h WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("memory") FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("kubernetes")  FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("swarm")  FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("mesos")  FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cattle") as cattle FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cattle") + sum("kubernetes")  + sum("mesos") + sum("swarm") + sum("windows") FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("active") FROM stacks_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") FROM services_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("active") FROM services_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cattle") as cattle, sum("kubernetes") as kubernetes, sum("mesos") as mesos, sum("swarm") as swarm, sum("windows") as windows FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") FROM stacks_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE  install_version !~ /v2(.*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),status

SELECT sum("kubernetes") AS "kubernetes", sum("mesos") AS "mesos", sum("swarm") AS "swarm", sum("windows") AS "windows", sum("cattle") AS "cattle" 
FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("kubernetes") AS "kubernetes", sum("mesos") AS "mesos", sum("swarm") AS "swarm", sum("windows") AS "windows", sum("cattle") AS "cattle" 
FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("running") AS "Running" FROM containers_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("running") AS "Running" FROM containers_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active" FROM services_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active" FROM services_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active" FROM stacks_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active" FROM stacks_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("host") AS "Hosts", sum("cpu") AS "CPU" FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("host") AS "Hosts", sum("cpu") AS "CPU" FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("memory") AS "Mem" FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("memory") AS "Mem" FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE install_version =~ /v2(.*)/
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE install_version =~ /v2(.*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_time)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total" FROM v2_nodes_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("mem_mb")/1024 as "Mem Gb" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cpu") AS "CPU" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("namespaces") AS "Namespaces" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Projects" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("workloads") AS "workloads" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("pods") AS "Pods" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE install_version =~ /v2(.*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),status
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active", sum("monitoring") AS "Monitoring", sum("istio") AS "Istio" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active", sum("monitoring") AS "Monitoring", sum("istio") AS "Istio" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cluster_aks") AS "AKS", sum("cluster_eks") AS "EKS", sum("cluster_gke") AS "GKE", sum("cluster_imported") AS "imported", sum("cluster_rke") AS "RKE", sum("cluster_k3s") AS "K3S", sum("cluster_k3sBased") AS "K3SBased" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cluster_aks") AS "AKS", sum("cluster_eks") AS "EKS", sum("cluster_gke") AS "GKE", sum("cluster_imported") AS "imported", sum("cluster_rke") AS "RKE" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter  AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cluster_logging_provider_custom") AS "custom", sum("cluster_logging_provider_elasticsearch") AS "elasticsearch", sum("cluster_logging_provider_fluentd") AS "fluentd", sum("cluster_logging_provider_kafka") AS "kafka", sum("cluster_logging_provider_splunk") AS "splunk", sum("cluster_logging_provider_syslog") AS "syslog" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cluster_logging_provider_custom") AS "custom", sum("cluster_logging_provider_elasticsearch") AS "elasticsearch", sum("cluster_logging_provider_fluentd") AS "fluentd", sum("cluster_logging_provider_kafka") AS "kafka", sum("cluster_logging_provider_splunk") AS "splunk", sum("cluster_logging_provider_syslog") AS "syslog" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter  AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cluster_cloud_provider_aws") AS "AWS", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_azure") AS "Azure", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_custom") AS "Custom",  sum("cluster_cloud_provider_gce") AS "GCE",sum("cluster_cloud_provider_external") AS "External", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_openstack") AS "Openstack", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_vsphere") AS "Vsphere" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cluster_cloud_provider_aws") AS "AWS", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_azure") AS "Azure", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_custom") AS "Custom",  sum("cluster_cloud_provider_gce") AS "GCE",sum("cluster_cloud_provider_external") AS "External", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_openstack") AS "Openstack", sum("cluster_cloud_provider_vsphere") AS "Vsphere" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter  AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: RKE clusters by cloud provider - new

targets.query: SELECT sum("cpu") AS "CPU", sum("mem_mb")/1024 as "Mem Gb" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cpu") AS "CPU", sum("mem_mb")/1024 as "Mem Gb" FROM v2_clusters_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter and  status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active", sum("from_template") AS "From_template", sum("imported") AS "Imported" FROM v2_nodes_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Total", sum("active") AS "Active", sum("from_template") AS "From_template" FROM v2_nodes_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter and  status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("node_azure") AS "Azure", sum("node_ec2") AS "ec2", sum("imported") AS "Imported", sum("node_do") AS "DO", sum("node_openstack") AS "openstack", sum("node_vsphere") AS "vsphere" FROM v2_nodes_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("node_azure") AS "Azure", sum("node_ec2") AS "ec2", sum("imported") AS "Imported", sum("node_do") AS "DO", sum("node_openstack") AS "openstack", sum("node_vsphere") AS "vsphere" FROM v2_nodes_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter and  status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("controlplane") AS "Control_plane", sum("etcd") AS "Etcd", sum("worker") AS "Worker" FROM v2_nodes_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("controlplane") AS "Control_plane", sum("etcd") AS "Etcd", sum("worker") AS "Worker" FROM v2_nodes_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter and  status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Projects", sum("namespaces") AS "Namespaces" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") AS "Projects", sum("namespaces") AS "Namespaces" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter and  status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("pods") AS "Pods", sum("workloads") AS "workloads" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("pods") AS "Pods", sum("workloads") AS "workloads" FROM v2_projects_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter and  status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT ip, total, active, mem_mb, cpu, namespaces from v2_top_clusters_by_total WHERE $timeFilter group by uid ORDER BY time DESC limit 1
SELECT ip, active, total, mem_mb, cpu, namespaces from v2_top_clusters_by_active WHERE $timeFilter group by uid ORDER BY time DESC limit 1
SELECT ip, total, pods, workloads, namespaces FROM v2_top_projects_by_total WHERE $timeFilter group by uid ORDER BY time DESC limit 1
SELECT ip, total, active, mem_mb, controlplane, etcd, worker FROM v2_top_nodes_by_total WHERE $timeFilter group by uid ORDER BY time DESC limit 1
